name: Unstable Connection
description:
Establish, then maintain your connection to the network, and complete the download!

Play area is separated into two zones- the node terminal and a world viewer- manage your connection in the terminal, and view the physical network below.

Controls are pretty much just left click. And “R” to restart a level.

Tested on the few levels, but some of the traversal code is wonky, let me know if it does anything unexpected.
